The badges in the table above indicate the most recently released version of each DeGAUSS image. Clicking each badge links to a GitHub releases page with notes about changes made in each version release. It is possible to specify an older version by adding the tag onto the repo/image name, e.g. `degauss/geocoder:v2.2`.
